title: Bratislava through the eyes of Ireland's ambassador
itunes:author: The Slovak Spectator
itunes:summary:
Hilda Ó Riain, Ambassador of Ireland to Slovakia, reveals where in Bratislava you can often meet her and what she loves about the city. She even provides a short Irish language class. 
  
Photo: TASR 
Presenter: Peter Dlhopolec
itunes:subtitle: Hilda Ó Riain, Ambassador of Ireland to Slovakia,…
